key_25.comment:
Vietnam Veterans Benefit Country Joe & Jefferson Starship Opened
Jerry Garcia - Guitar Bob Weir - Guitar Brent Mydland - Keyboards Phil Lesh - Bass Bill Kreutzmann - Drums Mickey Hart - Drums Airto Moreira - Drums Flora Purim - Vocals * Boz Skaggs - Guitar, Vocals # John Cippolina - Guitar ^

key_40.set1: West L.A. Fadeaway Dupree's Diamond Blues # Dupree's Diamond Blues noodling Touch of Grey talking
key_40.comment: # - The songs breaks down after the 1st verse or so -The recording is cut short according to tthe DHTC (missing the 2nd Touch of Grey and the 2 takes of Keep Your Day Job).

key_41.comment:
Springfield Creamery Presents the Second Decadenal Field TripOther artist(s): Peter Rowan; The Flying Karamozov Brothers; Strangers with Candy; Robert Cray Band;Tattoo
Held at the site of the Oregon Country Fair Grounds. It is NOT the Oregon State Fair Grounds NOR the Oregon County Fair Grounds.
